mapper.insert: insert into post values (null, #{title}, #{contents}, now(), coalesce(#{categoryNo}, 1))
mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.reg_date as regDate, a.category_no as categoryNo, b.id from post a inner join category b on a.category_no = b.no where b.id = #{id} order by a.reg_date
